attributes.action: Help small businesses by giving a small fund to help start up
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition needs to be signed by as many people to get SME's help just like me to get help I work 20 hours for a DIY firm but run my web design company from home and have little or no cash at all for any marketing etc...So if you're in the same boat please sign this.
And before you ask yes I have tried other sources like the Prince's Trust etc
